test_email_response module¶

test_email_response.response()[source]¶

We use fixture to initialize the Response class with some default values.

test_email_response.test_append_content(response)[source]¶

Test if content is appended correctly to the email body. this test add a string to the email body and check if it is present in the body.

test_email_response.test_initialization(response)[source]¶

Test if the Response class initializes correctly. Ensures all attributes are correctly set.

test_email_response.test_make_response(response)[source]¶

Test if make_response constructs the email properly. Ensures that headers (From, To, Subject) are set correctly and that the body.

test_email_response.test_send_response(mock_smtp, response)[source]¶

Test if send_response successfully sends an email. Uses a mock SMTP server to ensure the correct sequence of operations is followed.
